dcterms:creator: David Chen
William B Dolan
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 1970 short video clips from Youtube annotated with multi-lingual captions. The authors used only the English captions and separated the dataset into 1,200 train, 100 validation, and 670 test videos.
dcterms:title: MSVD

dcterms:creator: Ranjay Krishna
Kenji Hata
Frederic Ren
Li Fei-Fei
Juan Carlos Niebles
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 20K videos amounting to 849 video hours with over 100K total descriptions. The authors followed the official train-validation splits, which assigns 10,009 and 4,917 videos respectively.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet Captions
